ygData.subject: An Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Melefante, what s up?  Even tho my idea for an all mage guild didn t work.. I have a new idea =) Bazaar is going to be REOPENED in Freeport... how is this
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Melefante, what's up? Even tho my idea for an
all mage guild didn't work.. I have a new idea =)
Bazaar is going to be REOPENED in Freeport... how is
this possible you ask? Well, if we all take our
business to FP, then we can open up a mini-bazaar of
course for the time being, we won't have the niceities
of AFk and such, but, with enough people there we can
sell on the auction channel and just tell people we
are in FP... the upside to FP is that ANYONE can go
there. (short of certian evil people which may often
use disguises to get in or just up faction) The idea,
is lead by example.. Start selling your goods in FP
and others will come and do the same... if we start
doing this on ALL the servers, verant might take and
do something about it.. who knows, we might even have
afk merchant abilities after a few months.... tell
your friends ... tell your clients... tell the people
who HATE luclin altogether, the bazaar is opening in
FREEPORT and we SHALL succeed !!!!

talk to yall later,
Marshun PsyKo,
AKA Willim Lupin Tribunal server 20th season
